price: E, com efeito, um Mensageiro chegou-lhes, vindo deles, mas desmentiram-no. Então, o castigo apanhou-os enquanto injustos.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum rasūlun min'hum fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu wahum ẓālimūna
